208  void Load(const char *filename, const char *fmt = "txt") {
209  eternity::xml_archive fa;
210  fa.open(filename, eternity::archive::load);
211  xml_serialize(fa, "");
212  fa.close();
213  }
214 
215  void Save(const char *filename, const char *fmt = "txt") {
216  eternity::xml_archive fa;
217  fa.open(filename, eternity::archive::store);
218  xml_serialize(fa, "");
219  fa.close();
220  }
221 
222  void xml_serialize(eternity::xml_archive& xml, const char* p) {
223  char buffer[1024];
224 
225  if (xml.is_loading()) {
226 
227  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mOrder", p);
228  xml.read(buffer, mOrder, 0);
229  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mKf", p);
230  DVECTOR_XML_SERIALIZE(mKf, xml, buffer);
231  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mKb", p);
232  DVECTOR_XML_SERIALIZE(mKb, xml, buffer);
233  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mEF", p);
234  DMATRIX_XML_SERIALIZE(mEF, xml, buffer);
235  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mEB", p);
236  DMATRIX_XML_SERIALIZE(mEB, xml, buffer);
237  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mF0", p);
238  xml.read(buffer, mF0, 0);
239 
240  } else {
241 
242  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mOrder", p);
243  xml.write(buffer, mOrder);
244  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mKf", p);
245  DVECTOR_XML_SERIALIZE(mKf, xml, buffer);
246  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mKb", p);
247  DVECTOR_XML_SERIALIZE(mKb, xml, buffer);
248  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mEF", p);
249  DMATRIX_XML_SERIALIZE(mEF, xml, buffer);
250  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mEB", p);
251  DMATRIX_XML_SERIALIZE(mEB, xml, buffer);
252  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mF0", p);
253  xml.write(buffer, mF0);
254 
255 
256 
257  }
258  }
259 
260 
261  protected:
262 
263  private:
264  unsigned int mOrder;
265  double mSigma;
266  Dmatrix mEF;
267  Dmatrix mEB;
268  Dmatrix mEpf;
269  Dmatrix mEpb;
270  Dvector mKf;
271  Dvector mKb;
272  Dvector mG;
273  double mLambda;
274  unsigned int mF0;
276  };
